document.discussion_title: Billboard Awards 2016: DNCE, Shawn Mendes to Perform | Billboard
document.topic_text: The Joe Jonas -led band and Mendes join previously announced performers such as P!nk and The Go-Go's , who are celebrating the 35th anniversary of "We Got the Beat." P!nk will be on hand for the world television debut of "Just Like Fire," her new single from Alice Through the Looking Glass .
document.post: The Joe Jonas -led band and Mendes join previously announced performers such as P!nk and The Go-Go's , who are celebrating the 35th anniversary of "We Got the Beat."
